DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Determine feasibility vaccination autologous heat shock protein 70 patient chronic phase chronic myelogenous leukemia . - Determine toxicity vaccination patient . OUTLINE : Patients undergo leukapheresis obtain peripheral mononuclear cell ( PMNCs ) . Heat shock protein 70 ( HSP70 ) derive autologous PMNCs . Patients receive HSP70 intradermally weekly 8 week . Patients follow 2 week . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 10 patient accrue study .
